column1: Al Farwaniyah (Arabic: الفروانية‎) is the capital of the Al Farwaniyah Governorate in Kuwait. The Ghazali Expressway passes to the west of the district and the road leading to Kuwait International Airport to the east
column2: both roads in a north-south direction. Farwaniya contains mosques

column1: It's the most populated city in Kuwait.
